metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17485 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - high.
metadata.Description: FasterXML jackson-databind through 2.8.10 and 2.9.x through 2.9.3 allows unauthenticated remote code execution because of an incomplete fix for the CVE-2017-7525 deserialization flaw. This is exploitable by sending maliciously crafted JSON input to the readValue method of the ObjectMapper, bypassing a blacklist that is ineffective if the Spring libraries are available in the classpath. It was discovered that Jackson Databind incorrectly handled deserialization. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.

notes.Note: msalvatore> The fix for CVE-2017-7525 has not yet been applied

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.4-1').
